thread.title: EastEnders lines up a huge storyline for Tina Carter | Metro News
thread.title_full: EastEnders lines up a huge storyline for Tina Carter | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: EastEnders lines up a huge storyline for Tina Carter | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 4:21 pm (Picture: BBC) 
Compared to the rest of the Carter clan, things have been relatively quiet in EastEnders for Tina – but that’s all set to change as the soap are lining up a ‘huge’ storyline for the character, according to actress Luisa Bradshaw-White, who plays her. Everything you need to know about Legion – the new Marvel TV show that’s going to change the superhero game completely 
Fans are currently watching Tina struggle with the full time care of her ailing mum Sylvie and Shirley’s help with this is often fairly lacking. Whether or not this forms the basis of Tina’s big story in coming weeks remains to be seen. 
Speaking to Inside Soap , Luisa teased: ‘There are huge things coming up, and it’s full on for Tina – but that’s all I can say for now. It’s really busy at the moment but I like it. It’s kind of crazy, but very exciting.’ (Picture: BBC) 
With Linda off screen, Mick soon to follow, the recent exits of Aunt Babe and Lee and and an imminent break for Shirley, Tina, Johnny, Sylvie and Whitney will be the sole representatives of the Carter name in Albert Square. Well, aside from Lady Di of course. 
But with her relatives away, will Tina be able to hold everything together as whatever is in store unfolds?
